summary: This mod adds the ability to harvest apples from some trees (At the moment there is an apple farm outside Whiterun)
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever wondered were Carllota get her extremely juicy apples? The traders down south?
........................I Think not,............................................................................

Introducing Splishys-Sour Apples Apple Farm tm

This mod adds the ability to harvest Apples from some trees! Whiteruns main source of apples is now available for you to pick yourself, Skyrims best kept secret, Splishy-Sour Apples Apple farm!!! tm

The farm is located just outside Whiterun by Chillfurow farm. You will see Splishy either walking around picking apples or sitting in his comfy chair.

To get apples from trees simply walk up to it and harvest them like any other plant. Now enjoy your apples, Oh and Splishy has a emm stash, of somthing you may want to read (your going to need the linen wrap)
author: jakeoberg
